TopicTitle: Gilly orbital characteristics say that it has no gravity.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 (latest) | CPU: I9 CPU Intel | GPU: 3060 6 gb (laptop) | RAM: 16 GB

 

Image explains most of  the issue - gravity is shown as 0.00 when Gilly does, in fact, have gravity. This is most likely due to the system of calculating characteristics/showing stats in the tracking station "cuts" numbers instead of rounding them, or maybe just a mistake from a dev putting in these values.
